column1: #Text=[0127] To a one liter, three-neck round bottom flask containing dry tetrahydrofuran (THF) (300 ml) under nitrogen was added Terathane.TM. 2900 polytetramethylene glycol (79.13 g, 0.027 mol), 1,4-butanediol (3.97 g, 0.044 mol), and trimethylolpropane (1.21 g, 0.0090 mol).

#Text=This mixture was stirred under nitrogen until a solution was obtained and then isophorone diisocyanate (15.69 g, 0.071 mol) was added, and then the mixture was degassed under reduced pressure (0.1 mm Hg).
#Text=Dibutyltin dilaurate (0.20 g, 0.0003 mol) was added and the mixture was heated at 60.degree.
#Text=To this solution were added 3-isocyanatopropyltriethoxysilane (7.98 g, 0.033 mol) and additional THF (85 ml).
#Text=C. for 15 hours, yielding a solution containing 24 weight % dissolved solids.

#Text=[0129] To a 500 ml, three-neck round bottom flask containing dry tetrahydrofuran (THF) (150 ml) under nitrogen were added Terathane.TM. 650 polytetramethylene glycol (19.45 g, 0.030 mol), 1,4-butanediol (4.25 g, 0.047 mol), Polyfox.RTM.
#Text=PF-6320 surfactant (5.36 g, 0.0014 mol) and trimethylolpropane (1.30 g, 0.010 mol).

#Text=The resulting mixture was stirred under nitrogen until a solution was obtained and then isophorone diisocyanate (19.64 g, 0.088 mol) was added, and the mixture was degassed under reduced pressure (0.1 mm Hg).
#Text=Dibutyltin dilaurate (0.10 g, 0.0002 mol) was added, and the resulting mixture was heated at 60.degree.
#Text=To this solution, were added 3-isocyanatopropyl-triethoxysilane (4.04 g, 0.0081 mol) and additional THF (35 ml).
#Text=C. for 15 hours, yielding a solution containing 24 weight % dissolved solids.
